author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Silmaasema Oct-Dec Adjusted EBITDA Down At EUR 2.8 Mln​
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - SILMAASEMA OYJ:
* OCT-DEC ‍NET SALES INCREASED BY 12.8% FROM OCTOBER-DECEMBER 2016, AMOUNTING TO EUR 30.9 MILLION (27.4)​
* ‍OCT-DEC ADJUSTED EBITDA DECREASED BY 31.3% AND WAS EUR 2.8 MILLION (4.0)​
* ‍OUTLOOK FOR 2018: NET SALES ARE ESTIMATED TO GROW COMPARED TO PREVIOUS YEAR​
* THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PROPOSES THAT NO DIVIDEND WILL BE PAID FOR THE FISCAL YEAR 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
